I know you're familiar with minstrel shows.  They came about at the turn of the 19th century.  It was a variety show in which the talent was in blackface - singing, dancing, telling jokes, doing skits.
So let's take this great form, this very American tradition of entertainment into the 21st century, into the new millennium.
It is called: MANTAN - THE NEW MILLENNIUM MINSTREL SHOW.
